ComputationMethod:
* Conducting Labour force survey.
* Population & Housing Census
* NSDP Baseline Survey
Concept: Australian Government’s seasonal worker Programme assists employers from selected Pacific island countries including Vanuatu in the form of agriculture in terms of different farming and accommodation sector to fill employment gaps unable to be met by local Australian workforce. It also contributes to the economic development of the employee.
DataSource:
* Department of Labour
* Vanuatu National Statistics Office
Definition: This measures the number of individuals participating in Australian seasonal work programme (SWP).
Dissaggregation:
* Sex
*Age
* Area Council
* Rural & Urban
* Provincial Level
* National Level
FrequencyOfCollection:
* Census & NSDP Baseline survey (10 years)
* Reserve Bank of Vanuatu quarterly report.
IndicatorShortName: Change in Total Participation in Seasonal Work Programmes
Rationale:
* To determine which province, islands & villages are gaining access to this program.

* Information collected will determine future research on the impacts of labour mobility in Vanuatu.
 
* To assist future decisions on labour mobility policy and development outcome assessments.
graph_title: Change in total number of individuals participating in seasonal work programmes
